oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Variety Award Presentation - 1954-01-21 - Part 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program aimed at George Rosen of Variety magazine. Written by Bill Graham; engineered by Elmer Alley, Charles Bragg, Glen Snoddy, and Tom Sparkman; produced by Noel Digby. Part four of six.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Slew Foot Five
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: David Cobb introduces the Slew Foot Five -- [Unidentified musical excerpt] (Slew Foot Five) -- David Cobb reads from Variety magazine -- Ernie Keller and David Cobb talk about the WSM news department -- David Cobb talks about WSM coverage of a Fayatteville, TN tornado -- Ernie Keller talks about Parade Of Science -- Recording of Gov. Frank Clement -- David Cobb talks about Meet Your Government -- David Cobb and Ernie Keller outline WSM special broadcasts including programs Guestbook and Cause For Debate -- Ernie Keller outlines the expansion of the WSM news department -- Excerpt of a sports broadcast -- David Cobb and Ernie Keller talk about the WSM sports department
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Cobb, David (Announcer); Keller, Ernie; Slewfoot Five (Musical group); Cooney, Marjorie; Parade of science (Radio program); Clement, Frank Goad; Meet your government (Radio program); Guestbook (Radio program); Cause for debate (Radio program)
